text: Robert William RisCassi (born January 18, 1936) is a retired United States Army four-star general. He was Vice Chief of Staff of the United States Army (VCSA) from 1989 to 1990. RisCassi was born in Hartford, Connecticut. He is a 1958 graduate of the University of Connecticut. He was awarded the University of Connecticut Distinguished Alumni Award in 1989.UCAA Distinguished Alumni Award Past Recipients ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Military people from Connecticut
title: Robert W. RisCassi
